member.name: D3D12_DRED_AUTO_BREADCRUMBS_OUTPUT

summary.para: Contains a pointer to the head of a linked list of objects. The list represents the auto-breadcrumb state prior to device removal.

member.seealso: Use DRED to diagnose GPU faults

summary.para: A pointer to a constant object representing the head of a linked list of auto-breadcrumb nodes, or nullptr if the list is empty.
